option.name: up
option._long: move focus to the closest window above

option.name: down
option._long: move focus to the closest window below

option.name: right
option._long: move focus to the closest window to the right

option.name: left
option._long: move focus to the closest window to the left

option.name: grace-up
option._long: add an amount of pixel upwards in which windows will be ignored. Can be negative

option.name: grace-down
option._long: add an amount of pixel downwards in which windows will be ignored. Can be negative

option.name: grace-right
option._long: add an amount of pixel to the right in which windows will be ignored. Can be negative

option.name: grace-left
option._long: add an amount of pixel to the left in which windows will be ignored. Can be negative

option.name: cross-output
option._long: enables moving focus between different outputs

option.name: raise-on-change
option._long: raise the newly focused window to the top

option.name: scan-height
option._long: the height of the bounding box used to scan for windows to the left or right. If zero it will be the height of the view. If negative it will be the height of the view subtracted by the value

option.name: scan-width
option._long: the width of the bounding box used to scan for window above or below. If zero it will be the width of the view. If negative it will be the width of the view subtracted by the value
